thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: Not Happy
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Not Happy

author: Not Happy
title: Not Happy
text: Car had not been refuelled on pick up but we did not realise until the petrol light came on later that night. Raised this when returning vehicle but were simply told it could not be the case. We could not prove what had happened so received no compensation. Requested manager investigate but never heard anything back. Will not use Redspot again.
